sun.jvm.hotspot.debugger.cdbg

Interface LocalSym

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Sym
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicLocalSym

    public interface LocalSym
extends Sym
    Models a local variable in a scope. The meaning of the frame offset is platform-dependent, and is typically added to the base of frame pointer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getFrameOffset()
      Offset, in bytes, in the frame of the local variable
      java.lang.String getName()
      Name of the local variable
      Type getType()
      Type of the local variable

      • Methods inherited from interface sun.jvm.hotspot.debugger.cdbg.Sym
